about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of the Ribbon Racer game includes extended versions of music that can be listened on the tracks in the game. The soundtrack contains 20 tracks (from 19 tracks in game + bonus music from the Ribbon Racer Next trailer) composed by Mateusz JaN Mazur, a member of Bez Effectu band.

Track list:
01. For a good start (2:45)
02. Night in the city (2:29)
03. The snowy valley (2:36)
04. Practice makes perfect (2:18)
05. Skies (2:22)
06. Red planet (1:52)
07. The snowy valley 2 (3:20)
08. Tower defence (2:16)
09. Night in the park (2:56)
10. Counterclockwise screw (2:24)
11. Mountains (3:15)
12. Underground factory (1:57)
13. Tower defence 2 (1:52)
14. Nova (2:13)
15. Twister of scales (1:52)
16. World of lifts (2:36)
17. Amazing Amazon (2:48)
18. Two worlds (2:57)
19. Up and down (2:53)
20. BONUS: The thaw (RR Next main theme) (2:44)

All tracks are in .mp3 format.
Soundtrack will be downloaded into game main directory by default (.../Steam/SteamApps/common/Ribbon Racer/Ribbon Racer OST)

The soundtrack contains 20 tracks (from 19 tracks in game + bonus music from the Ribbon Racer Next trailer) composed by Mateusz JaN Mazur, a member of Bez Effectu band.

name: Ribbon Racer - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N3060
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

short_description: This is the original soundtrack from Ribbon Racer game, contains 20 unique tracks composed by Mateusz JaN Mazur.
